column5: In the heart of Dallas County, a stones throw from Hwy 635 (LBJ) and the North Dallas Tollway, sits a beautiful Townhome community, securely nestled behind the Hilton Hotel off of Harvest Hill Rd. I love living here and would love to have you visit!
column8: Galleria Area Townhome 2 Rooms 2 Queen Beds 2 Bath
